bibl.title: Ashes to Ashes? The Library of Alexandria after 48 BC 167 - ±182.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Fire and aftermath. - Beyond the fire: post-Hellenistic intellectual trends. - The weight of tradition: Didymus and meta-scholarship. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Myrto Hatzimichali, Ashes to Ashes? The Library of Alexandria after 48 BC 167 - ±182.
Jason König, Katerina Oikonomopoulou & Greg Woolf (edd.), Ancient Libraries (Cambridge, 2013) pp. 167-182.
Introduction. - Fire and aftermath. - Beyond the fire: post-Hellenistic intellectual trends. - The weight of tradition: Didymus and meta-scholarship. - Conclusions.
